## WebOIDCContainer.logout() method

Logout.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
logout(options?: {
        force?: boolean;
        redirectURI?: string;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>{</code><br/><code>        force?: boolean;</code><br/><code>        redirectURI?: string;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Logout options |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`

## Remarks

If `force` parameter is set to `true`<!-- -->, all potential errors (e.g. network error) would be ignored.

`redirectURI` will be used only for the first party app
